title: FK Radnički Šid
text:
FK Radnički Šid () is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="%C5%A0id">Šid</a>, <a href="Vojvodina">Vojvodina</a>, <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>. They currently compete in the <a href="Vojvodina%20League%20South">Vojvodina League South</a>, the fourth tier of the <a href="Serbian%20football%20league%20system">national league system</a>.
History.
In June 2010, Radnički merged with <a href="2009%E2%80%9310%20Serbian%20League%20Vojvodina">2009–10 Serbian League Vojvodina</a> champions <a href="FK%20Ba%C4%8Dinci">Big Bull Bačinci</a> to compete under the name Big Bull Radnički in the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Serbian%20First%20League">2010–11 Serbian First League</a>. They finished second from the bottom in their debut season in the second tier, thus suffering relegation back to the <a href="Serbian%20League%20Vojvodina">Serbian League Vojvodina</a>. Afterwards, the club continued competing under the name Radnički in the 2011–12 Serbian League Vojvodina.
